message: Hi Bob, I propose that I receive $70 and you receive $30. By agreeing now in round 1 we avoid any further inflation loss on my side. I believe this offer is fair and timely. Looking forward to your acceptance!

Alice, let's be reasonable. I propose a split of $60 for me and $40 for you. This is a much fairer division, especially considering we only have 12 rounds. Let's take this deal and avoid further rounds.
